title: Drawing, "Studies for the Flagellat", ca. 1630
inscribed: Inscribed lower right, pen and brown ink: Cav. d'arpino D/2; on verso by later hands (18th century)
provenance: From the Collection of Giovanni Piancastelli, Rome; Mr. and Mrs. Edward Brandegee, Boston
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Studies for the Flagellat", ca. 1630.
ca. 1630. Red and black chalk. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7071.
